channel.title: CVE Feed for Progress Software Corporation -- Telerik Reporting
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Progress Software Corporation -- Telerik Reporting

item.title: CVE-2024-1856|2024-03-20T13:13:51.409Z -- Progress Software Corporation -- Telerik Reporting
item.description: In Progress® Telerik® Reporting versions prior to 2024 Q1 (18.0.24.130), a code execution attack is possible by a remote threat actor through an insecure deserialization vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-1801|2024-03-20T13:12:34.826Z -- Progress Software Corporation -- Telerik Reporting
item.description: In Progress® Telerik® Reporting versions prior to 2024 Q1 (18.0.24.130), a code execution attack is possible by a local threat actor through an insecure deserialization vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-4200|2024-05-15T16:56:25.177Z -- Progress Software Corporation -- Telerik Reporting
item.description: In Progress® Telerik® Reporting versions prior to 2024 Q2 (18.1.24.2.514), a code execution attack is possible by a local threat actor through an insecure deserialization vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-4202|2024-05-15T16:53:30.262Z -- Progress Software Corporation -- Telerik Reporting
item.description: In Progress® Telerik® Reporting versions prior to 2024 Q2 (18.1.24.514), a code execution attack is possible through an insecure instantiation vulnerability.
